name: 張俊賢
objective: 本課程在介紹及闡述化學原理及物質之性質，著重於現代化學理論及概念之導入。內容包括氣體、計量化學、原子結構、化學鍵、物質狀態、能量轉換、酸鹼理論、氧化還原反應、金屬及非金屬元素、核化學。
schedule:
First week :Chemical Foundations & Periodic Table
Second week :Chemical foundations & Periodic Table Test
Third week :Atoms, Molecules, and Ions
Fourth week :Atoms, Molecules, and Ions & Stoichiometry
Fifth week :Stoichiometry
Sixth week :Types of Chemical Reaction and Solution Stoichiometry
Seventh week :Types of Chemical Reaction and Solution Stoichiometry & Gas
Eighth week :Gas
Ninth week :Midterm exam(期中考)
Tenth week :Thermochemistry
Eleventh week : Thermochemistry & Atomic Structure and Periodicty
Twelfth week :Atomic Structure and Periodicity
Thirteenth week :Bonding: General Concepts
Fourteenth week :Bonding: General Concepts & Covalent Bonding: Orbitals
Fifteenth week :Covalent Bonding: Orbitals
Sixteenth week :Liquids and solids
Seventeenth week :Liquids and solids
Eighteenth week :Final exam.(期末考)
